document_title: Arthritis: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Arthritis is the name for a joint disease. When suffering from this disease, the patient will experience swelling and pain in one or more joints on the body. The main symptoms of the disease are pain and stiffness, which often get worse over time. The most commonly inflamed joint locations are:
Knee arthritis; Hip arthritis; Wrist arthritis; Ankle arthritis; Toe arthritis; …
Depending on the type of inflammation, your doctor will prescribe different treatment methods. Regardless of the method, the goal is to reduce symptoms and improve the patient's quality of life.
